title: Donald Trump Seems Pretty Bummed That Debra Messing Hates Him
text:
Photo: Aurora Rose/Patrick McMullan via Getty Image

Debra Messing (and her fabulous ginger mane) put her political feud with Susan Sarandon on temporary hold this weekend to give Donald Trump her full, unadulterated derision instead, after it was announced that the president would be attending a ritzy Beverly Hills fundraiser held during the week of the Emmys. “Please print a list of all attendees please,” she tweeted, among harsher sentiments. “The public has the right to know.” Trump, it seems, wasn’t too thrilled that Messing called attention to his Hollywood visit, and he relayed an anecdote about the two meeting during their halcyon days at NBC.

“I have not forgotten that when it was announced that I was going to do The Apprentice, and when it then became a big hit, helping NBC’s failed lineup greatly, Debra Messing came up to me at an Upfront and profusely thanked me, even calling me ‘sir,’” Trump tweeted this morning. “How times have changed!” In response, Messing spent Sunday morning profusely tweeting about Trump’s lack of action following the latest mass shooting in Texas.

I have not forgotten that when it was announced that I was going to do The Apprentice, and when it then became a big hit, helping NBC’s failed lineup greatly, @DebraMessing came up to me at an Upfront & profusely thanked me, even calling me “Sir.” How times have changed! — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) September 1, 2019

I’d rather you bring attention to the Catagory 5 Hurricane #Dorian threatening our south eastern coast, and the tragic & preventable shooting that occurred yesterday in #Texas. https://t.co/MVbOuHwKUU — Debra Messing (@DebraMessing) September 1, 2019

As a fun reminder, Messing earned an Emmy for her comedic work on Will & Grace. Trump received zero for The Apprentice.
description: Donald Trump is feuding with Will & Grace star Debra Messing on Twitter. He recalls that she was nice to him when they were both on NBC.
